thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. Steel Issues Statement On Presidential Tariffs On Imported Washing Machines, Solar Panels

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-U.S. Steel Issues Statement On Presidential Tariffs On Imported Washing Machines, Solar Panels

organizations.name: brief-u.s. steel issues statement on presidential tariffs on imported washing machines

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - United States Steel Corp:
* U.S. STEEL ISSUES STATEMENT ON PRESIDENTIAL TARIFFS ON IMPORTED WASHING MACHINES, SOLAR PANELS
* UNITED STATES STEEL- ‍HOPEFUL PRESIDENT WILL USE “HIS AUTHORITY TO ESTABLISH BROAD SECTION 232 REMEDY TARGETING STEEL IMPORTS THAT THREATEN U.S. NATIONAL SECURITY” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
